<<<<<<< HEAD
Christs victorie, and triumph in Heauen, and earth, ouer, and after death Fletcher, Giles, 1588?-1623.
[16], 45, [3], 47-78, 81-83, [1] p.
Printed by C. Legge, Cambridge : 1610.
Dedication signed: G. Fletcher, i.e. Giles Fletcher the younger. In verse. In this state title pages have fleur-de-lis printer's device (McKerrow 264).--STC. "Christs triumph ouer and after death" has separate dated title page. Some print show-through. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
